resources.string: There are problems with the security certificate for this site.
This certificate is not from a trusted authority.
The name of the site does not match the name on the certificate.
This certificate is not valid yet.
Failed to save for offline reading.
Open new windows behind the current one
Format web pages to fit the screen
Share bookmarks & other data between Android Browser and Google Chrome
Sync bookmarks between Android Browser and Google Chrome
Select Google account to share with
Fill out web forms in a single click
Enter and save data for auto-filling web form fields
Enter the data you want to auto-fill in web fields when you touch them.
Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor etc.
Browser can automatically complete web forms like this one. Would you like to set up your profile?
Auto-fill can always be configured through Browser Settings.
Clear locally cached content and databases
Locally cached content and databases will be deleted.
The browser navigation history will be deleted.
Clear all the saved form data
All saved form data will be deleted.
All saved passwords will be deleted.
Allow sites to request access to your location
Clear location access for all websites
Clear location access for all websites
Save usernames and passwords for websites
Remember data I type in forms for later use
Show warning if there is a problem with a site\'s security
Allow sites to save and read \"cookie\" data
Whether or not to override a website\'s request to control zoom behavior
Show overview of newly opened pages
Settings will revert to default values.
Swipe thumb from left or right edge to access quick controls and hide Application and URL bars
Use Google Instant when you use Google Search, to show results as you type (this can increase data use).
Use fullscreen mode to hide the status bar.
Checking this causes the browser to invert colors. Black will become white and vice versa.
Allow the browser to preload high confidence search results in the background

The page you are trying to view contains data that has already been submitted (\"POSTDATA\"). If you resend the data, any action the form on the page carried out (such as a search or online purchase) will be repeated.
Browser cannot load this page because there is no internet connection.
This site is attempting to open a pop-up window.
Could not open a new window because you have already opened the maximum number.
Could not open a new pop-up window because only one can be open at any time.
All %d downloads will be canceled and cleared from the download history.
%s could not be downloaded.\nFree up some space on your phone and try again.
USB storage is required to download %s.
An SD card is required to download %s.
The USB storage is busy. To allow downloads, select \"Turn off USB storage\" in the notification.
The SD card is busy. To allow downloads, select \"Turn off USB storage\" in the notification.
Cannot download. The content is not supported on this phone.
Cannot finish download. There is not enough space.
Cannot download. The size of the item cannot be determined.
Download interrupted. It cannot be resumed.
All data stored by this website will be deleted
This site can access your location. Change this in Settings -> Website settings
This site cannot access your location. Change this in Settings -> Website settings
This site can currently access your location
This site cannot currently access your location
Location access for this website will be cleared
All website data and location permissions will be deleted.
Bookmarks on this device are not yet associated with a Google account. Save these bookmarks by adding them to an account. Delete these bookmarks if you do not want to sync them.
Add bookmarks currently on this device and begin syncing with Google Account
Delete bookmarks currently on this device and begin synchronizing with Google Account
Delete bookmarks currently on this device and begin synchronizing bookmarks with %s.
Add bookmarks currently on this device and begin synchronizing bookmarks with %s.
Add your Android bookmarks to bookmarks for %s
Would you like to restore your browser windows from last time?
